thread.title: Ravichandran Ashwin Sets New Record, Is The Fastest To 250 Wickets In Tests - Indiatimes.com
thread.title_full: Ravichandran Ashwin Sets New Record, Is The Fastest To 250 Wickets In Tests - Indiatimes.com

title: Ravichandran Ashwin Sets New Record, Is The Fastest To 250 Wickets In Tests - Indiatimes.com
text:
Somak Adhikari February 12, 2017 
It was yet another feather in the cap of Ravichandran Ashwin has he became the fastest to 250 Test wickets. 
AFP 
By dismissing Bangladesh skipper Mushfiqur Rahim, the 30-year-old clinched the record in his 45th Test. Australia's Dennis Lillee held the previous record of doing it in 48 Tests. 
It's a great start to the year for Ashwin after 2016 saw him end as the No. 1 Test bowler in the world. 
AFP 
Ashwin finished for 2 for 98 as Bangladesh were bundled out for 388, 299 runs behind India's 687/6 in the one-off Test in Hyderabad. Don't Miss
